Elevate your gifting experience with our exquisite 12 Blush Roses vase. This timeless arrangement is a perfect expression of affection, ideal for special occasions  – a gift that speaks volumes without uttering a word.

This lovely arrangement includes Chocolates and Balloon.

Type:
Price: 995.00 - 1345.00 (4 variants)

Large: Contains between 60 - 70 roses.

entry.title: 'A7bk' XXXL Hatbox
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flowers.ae
Type:
Price: 8995.00 - 9265.00 (4 variants)

"A7bk" is a grand and romantic flower arrangement of red spray roses with the Arabic words "I Love You" in white roses, carefully arranged in an XXXL white hatbox. It is a perfect gift to express your love and admiration to someone special in a unique and meaningful way.

*This arrangement may take a minimum of 3 hours to handcraft. Please order in advance if possible*

Gift Set options include:
* with Balloons 6pcs
* with Box of Chocolates 28pcs
* with Classic Ferrero Cake  & 3 Balloons

entry.title: I Love You XXXL Hatbox
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flowers.ae
Type:
Price: 8995.00 - 9265.00 (4 variants)

Indulge in the ultimate expression of love with our grand flower arrangement of red spray roses, carefully crafted to spell out the words "I love you Anastasia" in pure white roses. This one-of-a-kind arrangement is customisable to your loved one's name or message, making it the perfect declaration of love.

*This arrangement may take a minimum of 3 hours to handcraft. Please order in advance if possible*

Gift Set options include:
* with Balloons 6pcs
* with Box of Chocolates 28pcs
* with Classic Ferrero Cake & 3 Balloons

entry.title: Letter XXXL
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flowers.ae
Type:
Price: 7795.00 - 11495.00 (2 variants)

Our luxurious handmade Standing Letter arrangement is guaranteed to impress. 

Wish to customise with different colours? Let us know in the delivery instruction box by noting the rose colour combination you would like to send.  

Create your loved ones name or message by selecting the number of letters in your message and specify in the 'Add Special Request' box.

The arrangement requires a minimum of 24-hours for preparation.

Box size 44x20cm

Gift Set options include:
* with Balloons 3pcs
* with Rose Geranium Candle

entry.title: Letter Heart Large
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flowers.ae
Type:
Price: 995.00 - 1345.00 (4 variants)

Our stunning signature letter Heart-Shaped Box is one of our most requested arrangements. Our classic heart-shaped box comes with a red rose background and white lettering.

Contains between 60 - 70 roses.

However you can customise in a range of different colours; Red, White, Pink, Yellow and Orange. You can note your preferred color and letter in the delivery instruction box and we will take care of the rest.

Gift Set options include:
* with Balloons 3pcs
* with Rose Geranium Candle

entry.title: Luxury Letter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Flowers.ae
Type:
Price: 845.00 - 1195.00 (4 variants)

Our ready to order luxury 40cm standing letter of your choice, A to Z wooden arrangement combines red, white, pink, yellow and orange stunning roses.

Wish to customise with different colours? Let us know in the delivery instruction box by noting the rose colour combination you would like to send. 

Create your loved ones name or message by selecting the number of letters in your message and specify in the 'Add Special Request' box. For example LOVE is four letters, so select that quantity (4) and note the letters desired in the special request box. 

Looking for a taller letter selection? WhatsApp us for more information.

Gift Set options include:
* with Balloons 3pcs
* with Rose Geranium Candle
